016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.providers;
017
018import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
019import jakarta.ws.rs.Consumes;
020import jakarta.ws.rs.WebApplicationException;
021import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
022import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap;
023import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter;
024import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
025
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.io.OutputStream;
028import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
029import java.lang.reflect.Type;
030import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
031
032@Singleton
033@Provider
034@Consumes(MediaType.WILDCARD)
035public class ByteBufferMessageBodyWriter
036        implements MessageBodyWriter<ByteBuffer> {
037
038    public ByteBufferMessageBodyWriter() {
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public boolean isWriteable(Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType) {
043        return ByteBuffer.class.isAssignableFrom(type);
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public void writeTo(ByteBuffer byteBuffer, Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations,
048                        MediaType mediaType, MultivaluedMap<String, Object> httpHeaders,
049                        OutputStream entityStream) throws IOException, WebApplicationException {
050        entityStream.write(byteBuffer.array());
051    }
052}
